educationLanding.title: THE BRİDGE EDUCATION
educationLanding.banner_desc: Welcome to the privileged world of New Bridge Education Consultancy.  In the UK, the homeland of English, you are at the right address for short and long-term educational programs for all age groups, travel and visa counselling, individual or group sightseeing tours, one-on-one or group online IELTS and TOEFL trainings, academic, general or social translation needs.
educationLanding.feature_desc: The world's largest selection of courses
educationLanding.popular_desc: Choose from many options of popular course at a breakthrough price.
educationLanding.explore_desc: Choose from 100,000 online video courses with new additions published every month.
educationLanding.about_desc: Our mission is to diversify the tech industry through accessible education and apprenticeship, unlocking the door to opportunity and empowering people to achieve their dreams.
educationLanding.testimonials_desc: They Are Doing Great Things With Us
educationLanding.contactUs_address: Address: New Bridge Education Consultancy Limited 80 The Parade, Flat 17 Oadby, Leicester Leicestershire LE25BF England United Kingdom
educationLanding.subscribe_subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter and stay updated on the latest developments and special offers!
educationLanding.ourMission_desc: Providing the most functional, fastest and affordable educational solutions and consultancy services in line with their needs as well as ensuring permanent customer satisfaction by providing all kinds of support and assistance as part of our services for every individual and institution we work with.
educationLanding.ourVision_desc: Taking a place among the reliable, dynamic and leading institutions in the English Language Education Consultancy sector in the near and medium future by using the opportunities of today's world in the most efficient ways.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_detailDesc: The English Summer School program in the UK, which is the most ambitious and specialized area of New Bridge Education Consultancy, is a short-term educational and cultural period that adorns the dreams of all students. With 20 years of UK Summer School Group Leadership experience, we guarantee an unforgettable program experience for our students and teachers.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitle1: TO THE ATTENTION OF PARENTS, SCHOOL ADMINISTRATORS AND TEACHERS!!!
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc1: If you want your student to participate in the Summer School program in the UK, the issues you should pay the most attention to and the services we offer are as follows:
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc2: A. SAFETY: The most important issue is that our students complete the program in a healthy and peaceful way and are delivered to their families.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc3: As New Bridge Education, the main reason for our choice to work with the most credible English Summer School organizations is their attentive approach to health and safety measures.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc4: An official from the Summer School meets our group of students and teachers at London Heathrow Airport and delivers them safely to the Summer School centre by a private bus.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc5: All employees at the English Summer School centre must have an advanced DBS (Disclosure and Barring Service) certificate. DBS is a UK Government approved Secure Employee document that all employees have to submit who work in the same environment with individuals under the age of 18.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc6: During classes, trips, in-school activities, during meal times or during leisure times, in short, at all times of the program, there is always an English Summer School staff who supervises our students.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc7: There is a fire drill at least once every 2 weeks and students are taught to come to the meeting point in the fastest and safest way.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc8: There are English Summer School officials on 24-hour duty in all accommodation buildings.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc9: No one who is not on duty is allowed in the Summer School centre.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc10: B. ACCOMMODATION: The MOST IDEAL and SAFEST accommodation for students aged 12-17 is located in the Summer School centre.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc11: All our students are taken from London Heathrow Airport by the school authority and placed in their rooms where they will stay during the program.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc12: All girls' and boys' student rooms are located in separate buildings in the same centre.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc13: Our Turkish teacher(s), who is a Group Leader, also stays in the same building with the students.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc14: C. ENGLISH EDUCATION: The UK Summer School program is not just a sightseeing and entertainment process, and it should not be the one.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc15: The English Summer School organization offers the most productive English education for our students that is expected from a summer school program with its experienced staff of British, American, Canadian and Australian teachers who are native speakers of English and experts in their fields.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc16: All our students improve their English levels with plenty of speaking and hands-on lessons in classes suitable for their levels.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc17: D.	INTERNATIONAL LEARNING ENVIRONMENT: The UK Summer School program should ensure student and nation diversity.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc18: All our students live in an internationally diverse environment with students of their own age group from all over the world.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc19: Students both introduce their own culture and gain a lot of different cultural knowledge. While doing all this, they practice and improve their English in their natural environment.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc20: E.	NUTRITION: The UK Summer School program should take into account the nutritional sensitivity of Turkish students.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc21: Nutrition is one of the most sensitive issues of all our Turkish students and parents.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc22: As New Bridge Education, we would like to inform you that all the food and drinks offered to our students in our English Summer School centres are hygienic, fresh, high in nutritional value and HALAL certified (for Meat and Chicken products).
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc23: F.	ACTIVITIES AND EXCURSIONS: The UK Summer School programme should include a wide range of social, cultural and sporting activities and excursions.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc24: 	The New Bridge Education UK Summer School Program offers great activities and excursions for our students.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc25: 	All of the activities are carried out under the supervision of experienced teachers of the English Summer School Activity Team.
educationLanding.englishSummerSchool_subTitleDesc26: 	Apart from afternoon and evening activities that include a full London experience, there are trips to the most important cities in the UK such as Cambridge, Oxford, Brighton or Canterbury 1 full day a week.
educationLanding.general_detailDesc: At New Bridge Education, we offer you a specialised consultancy service to ensure that the English education needs for all age groups and all levels are met in the UK in the most efficient and economical conditions.
educationLanding.general_detailDesc2: Especially due to the increase in the exchange rate in recent years, it is quite challenging economically for Turkish citizens to study languages abroad. English courses and visa fees, air tickets and accommodation fees as well as general living expenses during your stay abroad are considerations that make those who want to improve their English abroad think twice.
educationLanding.general_detailDesc3: As New Bridge Education, we provide services with our office located in the centre of Leicester, one of the most experienced cities in the UK in this perspective. To get to know the city more closely, which is a completely student-friendly with its historical and cultural diversity, lease CLICK HERE
educationLanding.general_detailDesc4: As New Bridge Education, we are cooperating with Leicester Language Academy and offering the highest quality English language education for our Turkish students at the most affordable prices exclusive to us only. For Leicester Language Academy English language education programs, Please CLICK HERE
educationLanding.ielts_subDesc: The Director of New Bridge Education Consultancy, Onur Yasar, started his professional teaching life in 1999 and has been teaching English to students and adults from all age groups since then. By obtaining the University of Cambridge CELTA (Certificate of English Language Teaching to Adults) certificate in 2012, he has ensured his expertise in the field of general and academic English and has guided hundreds of students from all levels and age groups with 25 years’ experience specifically for IELTS / TOEFL coaching. Thus, students have achieved their goals in the exams by taking the score they target.By participating in IELTS/TOEFL programs conducted online one-on-one or in a group, you can be a part of exam studies from anywhere in the world and achieve your dreams in the most reliable and shortest way.
educationLanding.academic_subDesc: As New Bridge Education, we provide all kinds of academic guidance services for Turkish students who want to do their Undergraduate, Graduate (Masters) or Doctoral studies in the UK. In addition, the following are the services we provide for Turkish students who are currently studying in the UK:
educationLanding.academic_subDesc3: Academic article reading and redaction/correction service
educationLanding.academic_subDesc5: All kinds of social and cultural life coaching
educationLanding.academic_subDesc6: Planning and guidance for the post-training process
